item.title: TikTok Hotbed for Allergy, Asthma Misinformation
item.description: Personal narratives on allergy and asthma conditions which contained inaccuracies gained the most traction online. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Can Earlier in the Day Infusions Improve SCLC Survival?
item.description: Researchers conduct a retrospective analysis of patients with SCLC who receive immunochemotherapy at different times of day. Medscape Medical News

item.title: New Device Uses Steam to Kill Prostate Cancer
item.description: The FDA has approved a transurethral thermal water vapor system for ablation of cancerous prostate tissue. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Many Patients Still Face GP Referral ‘Black Hole’
item.description: Patient satisfaction with GP referrals in England is rising, but thousands still face delays, lost paperwork, and poor communication that hinder their...

item.title: Private Care Rise Sparks Warning for NHS Scotland’s Future
item.description: A major review warns that Scotland’s NHS faces worsening performance, growing waits, and rising private care use unless leaders pursue urgent reform. ...
